title: Video: ILLIAL – Quite
content:
This new video from Swedish artist ILLIAL is one of the coolest visuals I’ve seen for a while.

The all-slightly-off-white aesthetic and the sheer tenderness of it is strikingly moving – especially when set against the Bon Iver meets How To Dress Well elegance of the track itself. FYI, make sure to watch until the end. Check out Quite below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
